title: Provided further that, the Planning Authority may accommodate, on the willingness of the owners / occupants residing in the existing building/s on reserved area, on the same land, on any floor of the proposed parking building
clause_text: Provided further that, the Planning Authority may accommodate, on the willingness of the owners / occupants residing in the existing building/s on reserved area, on the same land, on any floor of the proposed parking building. Public Amenity - Any amenity, along with ancillary use.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
